name: "Robot"
description:
Hello! This is another short puzzle game. This one's about opening doors! To rescue the cat!

No touch support for this one I'm afraid. You can play in your browser, or download a .zip archive. The archive contains a Windows executable, but if you're on Mac or Linux you can download an executable from https://godotengine.org

Controls:

Directional Buttons

Left and Right, or A and D = movement

Up, or W = enter elevators

A button

Z, or K = flick switches

Start button

J, or Enter, or Space = Play again, once you win
